name: Appleseed-search-arturs.io
body:
## Welcome to Appleseed Framework - Search Technologies Resource Page
The Appleseed Framework is maintained and managed primarily by [Anant Corporation](www.anant.us). It is composed of Appleseed Base, Appleseed Search, and [Appleseed Portal](https://github.com/Appleseed/portal). 

## Search Technologies
Here we will cover the various underlying technologies that Appleseed Search is made up of, and provide some resources regarding these technologies. 

### Apache Lucene
1. [An Introduction to Lucene](http://lucene.apache.org/core/)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
